protected int theOrient
stores the current orientation, defaults to 0, each increment represents a 90 degree clockwise rotation. max value of 3

kill

public void kill()
De-activate the piece at its current location (fill the corresponding cells with values > 1). Then check for cleared lines and add a new random piece to the board. TODO: Have this value depend on the shape of the piece, for coloring the board TODO: eliminate entirely? just have the board point to a new piece...
